Constructor Detail

TreeRepresentation

public TreeRepresentation()
Method Detail

buildToolBar

public javax.swing.JToolBar buildToolBar()
Builds a tool bar. It provides features like - changing a link representation in a tree (angled or straight)and changing an orientation of tree (horizontal or vertical)

setOrientation

public void setOrientation(int wanted)

addNode

public void addNode(java.lang.String node1,
                    java.lang.String parent,
                    java.lang.String link)
             throws NodeNotFoundException,
                    NodeNameNotUniqueException
Accepts a request to add a node to scenegraph. Node name must be unique or it will throw a NodeNameNotUnique exception. The node which should be set as a parent node must be already added to a tree or it will throw a NodeNotPresent exception.

removeNode

public void removeNode(java.lang.String node1)
                throws NodeNotFoundException
Accepts a node name remove that node from tree. It throws NodeNotFound exception if requested node is not present in tree.

initScreen

public void initScreen()
Opens nodefile.txt file and reads nodename, parent name and associated link from it. If parent node is not present and tree is not intialized yet, it will add that node as a parent node.

addAChild

public void addAChild(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String link)
This is method is called by addNode method. It will add a root node and intializes a tree if no node was selected ny addNode or it will add a new node as a child of a selected node. It will set a node name and a link given by addNode.

removeAChild

public void removeAChild()
This method is called by removeNode method. It takes a node selected by removeNode and removes from a tree.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
